entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `UseStaticFiles` should display the default PhysicalFileProvider default path when using a constructor that doesn't override the default `IFileProvider` #38481
  • [Blazor] CascadingTypeParameter problem #38479
  • Use overload of StreamResponseBodyFeature that accepts the previous feature in BrowserRefresh #38477
  • Slow Blazor wasm build in Visual Studio 2022 .NET 5.0 based #38476
  • Blazor httpcontext is renewed upon refreshing the page #38475
  • Not Able to Navigate Custom URL using GetUriWithQueryParameter #38478
  • Idea: .NET 6 Minimal Api - Set dynamic generated access modifier for "Program" class as a "public" not "internal" #38474
  • Blazor Server: Websocket problems with WAN-optimization / change port for SignalR / websocket connection #38472
  • InputDate with Type=InputDateType.Time and step=1 doesn't accept keyboard input #38471
  • EEFileLoadException when executing Services.AddMvc after upgrading from NET5.0 to NET6.0 #38469
  • Excessive memory usage using endpoint.MapControllerRoute - never ending story (continuation of #30092) #38468
  • TaskCanceled Exception thrown from Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerHandler class #38467
  • Razor runtime view compilation via environment variable not working in .NET 6 #38465
  • Core-React not started API(Server Side) #38463
  • InvalidOperationException on POST of form with large data #38462
  • Blazor to run in WASMEdge #38461
  • open a page as modal? #38459

Closed

  • Blazor wasm hosted Project Integrity errors on Deployment to Azure App service #37861
  • Recommend `Playwright Sharp` in Integration testing docs #31669
    7.0-preview1
  • ProducesAttribute hides HTTP 404 / behavior is counterintuitive #25385
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Facebook crawler rewrite doesn't work - issue with query string rewrite #5998
    Backlog
  • [Kestrel] Allow UTF-8 characters in request URL #17402
    Backlog
  • Virtualize component is missing support to virtualize DataTable.Rows #37875
    7.0-preview1
  • IAsyncEnumerable with System.Text.Json in IIS 10 - problem #38460
  • Auto update or refresh the token in blazor to signalr? #38325
  • When using .net core 3.1 runtime with System.Text.Json 6.0.0 the serialization doesn't honor new API. #38438
  • error trying to run dotnet watch #38303
  • Dedupe Razor helper classes across relevant repos #33058
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Visual Studio 2022 Launches Chrome - Only with limited features when running standalone React.Js projects #38464
  • Flaky test: InputDateInteractsWithEditContext_DateTimeLocalInput #34884
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Quarantining `InputDateInteractsWithEditContext_TimeInput` #35018
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Blazor Wasm Hosted Project : API Call not working, Returns Index.html for all API Calls #38396
  • Test failures: NavigateOnSubmitWorks, CanHandleClearedChild after SDK update #34857
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETest.Tests.WebAssemblyAuthenticationTests.CanPreserveApplicationState_DuringLogIn #35108
    6.0-docs-infra
  • .NET 6 Minimal API - WebApplicationFactory doesn't see custom settings json file values #38435
  • Blazor action and function object type is not disposed. #38423
  • Document pattern for prerendering head section #37293
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Visual Studio 2022 Couldn't start the SPA development server with command 'npm start' #38398
  • Perf improvement: json_netty #38391
  • WebApplicationFactory does not resolve the custom configured SQL Provider, but the one from Startup #28831
    Backlog
  • HttpResponseStreamWriter should override TextWriter.WriteLineAsync(string) #38210
    7.0-preview1
  • Make IValueProvider async #38451
  • reopen #38192. Bug not solved #38458
  • CSS isolation will not be closed. How can we really isolate? #38348

PullRequests

Created

  • chore - Use `HttpMethods` #38466
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • Create ReleasePlanning.md #37940
    Docs, area-infrastructure
  • Run InputDate E2E tests on WebAssembly only. Fixes #35018, #34884 #38473
    area-blazor
  • Override base implementations of WriteLineAsync in HttpResponseStreamWriter #38387
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Upgrade Playwright #38414
    Working, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Try Ubuntu 21.10 #38456
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] Update Docker images, queues, etc. #38427
    area-infrastructure
